attributes.action: allow bicycles to be taken on the Tyne and Wear Metro system outside of rush hour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Almost every other mass transit system in the world allows bikes to be conveyed outside of rush hour.  Why does Nexus not allow the same system to be used in Tyne and Wear?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
